channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Saturn’s Rings Will Disappear This Weekend
item.description: Saturn's iconic rings will disappear from view on March 23, 2025, due to the planet's tilt aligning them edge-on with Earth. They'll gradually return ...

item.title: ‘The Wheel Of Time’ Is Off To A Surprisingly Great Start In Season 3
item.description: The Wheel Of Time has vastly improved after its tepid first season. Season 3 is genuinely top-notch fantasy TV.

item.title: Counting The Economic Cost Of Poor Sewage And Waste Water Treatment
item.description: A new analysis by Back to Blue and the Ocean Sewage Alliance claims untreated sewage has become a “scourge” causing harmful impacts on human health.

item.title: Krispy Kreme Free Donuts For Grades—A Viral Loophole, Explained
